text: Danielki is a small village situated in southern Poland, close to the border crossing at Chyżne. According to the recent population census made in 2000, the village is inhabited by only 9 people. Its population used to be close to extinction due to harsh weather and climate conditions. In 1949 the settlement burned down, later it was rebuilt, with most houses built again of wood. Recently it has become a popular destination for celebrities to buy a summer cottage. Daniel Raybould's mother spent her childhood here. Danielki from a distance Category:Villages in Nowy Targ County
title: Danielki
